newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Metro Pacific to issue 500 mln-peso CPs.
newsitem.headline: Metro Pacific to issue 500 mln-peso CPs.

text.p: Metro Pacific Corp has applied to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for permission to issue 500 million pesos worth of long-term commercial paper, according to company documents submitted on Friday to the SEC.
Metro Pacific is the local unit of Hong Kong's First Pacific Co Ltd.
The company's previous authority to issue such papers expired on December 26, 1996.

The papers will have maturities of three to five years. It will carry an interest rate of either 10 percent or a premium of 1-1/8 percent over the 91-day average Treasury bill rate, whichever, is higher, the company said.
Metro Pacific also said the proceeds of the issue will be used to pre-pay outstanding debt. No firm date has yet been set for the sale of the long-term papers.
The documents showed the underwriter of the issue is East Asia (AEA) Capital Corp.
